message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're interested in the product, but I think it's worth more than $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering it to you for $11000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $10500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value.
